excerpt: "Ahmed Elsamadisi is the Founder & CEO of Narrator.ai,  a data intelligence company that equips decision makers with personalized actionable insights. Ahmed started his career at Cornell’s Autonomous Systems Laboratory focusing on human-robot interaction and Bayesian data fusion as well as building algorithms for autonomous cars."
